cards.name: Barehanded
cards.text: Play: Put each artifact on top of its owner’s deck.

cards.name: Beanstalk
cards.text:
Friendly Giant creatures enter play ready.
Action: Search your deck and discard pile for a Giant creature, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

cards.name: Brawling Grounds
cards.text: Omni: For the remainder of the turn, each time a creature is destroyed in a fight, its controller discards a random card from their hand.

cards.name: Brothers in Battle
cards.text: Play: Choose a house. For the remainder of the turn, each friendly creature of that house may fight.

cards.name: Countryside Crusher
cards.text:
After Fight: If your opponent is haunted, you may ready and fight with a neighboring creature.
Scrap: Ready and fight with the least powerful friendly creature.

cards.name: Curse of Cowardice
cards.text:
Treachery.
At the end of your turn, if you did not use any creatures to fight this turn, lose 2. If there are no friendly creatures in play, destroy Curse of Cowardice.

cards.name: Final Refrain
cards.text: Play: Put each creature from your discard pile into play ready, then fight with them one at a time. Destroy each creature put into play this way.

cards.name: Fling
cards.text: Play: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, deal damage to an enemy creature equal to the destroyed creature’s power with 3 splash.

cards.name: Forgemaster Og
cards.text: After a player forges a key, they lose all of their remaining .

cards.name: Igon the Green
cards.text: Destroyed: Purge Igon the Green. Return an Igon the Terrible from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Iron Obelisk
cards.text: Your opponent’s keys cost +1 for each friendly damaged Brobnar creature.

cards.name: Looter Goblin
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
After Reap: For the remainder of the turn, gain 1 after an enemy creature is destroyed.

cards.name: Might Makes Right
cards.text: Play: You may destroy any number of friendly creatures with total power of 25 or more. If you do, forge a key at no cost.

cards.name: Old Boomy
cards.text: After Reap: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Brobnar card or choose to stop. Deal 2 to Old Boomy if a Brobnar card was revealed. Archive each card revealed this way.

cards.name: Returning Champion
cards.text:
Play: Deal 3 to Returning Champion.
After Fight: If you are haunted, move all damage from Returning Champion to another creature.

cards.name: Rock-Hurling Giant
cards.text: After you discard a Brobnar card from your hand during your turn, you may deal 4 to a creature.

cards.name: Rorag Screamer
cards.text:
After Fight: Ready Rorag Screamer.
Scrap: Choose a creature. For the remainder of the turn, that creature loses elusive and all of its armor.

cards.name: The Big One
cards.text:
After a creature is played, put a fuse counter on The Big One. 
If there are 10 or more fuse counters on The Big One, destroy each creature and artifact.

cards.name: Tireless Crocag
cards.text:
Versatile. (This card may be used as if it belonged to the active house.)
Tireless Crocag cannot reap.
If there are no enemy creatures, destroy Tireless Crocag.

cards.name: Yo Mama Mastery
cards.text:
This creature gains taunt.
Play: Fully heal this creature.

cards.name: Awakened Titan
cards.text:
Enhance .
Taunt.
Awakened Titan cannot ready unless you are haunted.

cards.name: Bonecrusher
cards.text: This creature gains, “Action: Destroy a creature.”

cards.name: Burn the Stockpile
cards.text: Play: If your opponent has 7 or more, they lose 4.

cards.name: Cannon
cards.text: Action: Deal 2 to a creature.

cards.name: Concussive Transfer
cards.text: Play: Deal 3 to a creature. Redistribute all damage on creatures among all creatures.

cards.name: Crim Torchtooth
cards.text:
Splash-attack 4. (When this creature attacks, also deal 4 to each of the attacked creature’s neighbors.)
After Fight: Enrage each of Crim Torchtooth’s neighbors.

cards.name: Earthshaker
cards.text: Play: Destroy each creature with power 3 or lower.

cards.name: Fight to the End
cards.text: Play: Choose a friendly creature. If you are haunted, that creature gains skirmish. Ready and fight with that creature.

cards.name: Follow the Leader
cards.text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, each friendly creature may fight.

cards.name: Lifting Buddy
cards.text: Play/After Fight/After Reap: Give Lifting Buddy two +1 power counters. Give another friendly creature two +1 power counters.

cards.name: Plummet
cards.text: Play: Discard your hand. Deal 1 to each creature for each card discarded this way.

cards.name: Raider of the Peaks
cards.text: At the start of your turn, the player who controls the most powerful creature discards the top card of their deck.

cards.name: Rickety Cybergiant
cards.text: After Fight: Deal 1 to Rickety Cybergiant.

cards.name: Smith
cards.text: Play: Gain 2 if you control more creatures than your opponent.

cards.name: Sound the Horns
cards.text: Play: Discard cards from the top of your deck until you either discard a Brobnar creature or run out of cards. If you discarded a Brobnar creature this way, put it into your hand.

cards.name: The Warchest
cards.text: Action: Gain 1 for each enemy creature that was destroyed in a fight this turn.

cards.name: Berserker Slam
cards.text: Play: Deal 4 to a flank creature. If this damage destroys that creature, its controller loses 1.

cards.name: Blunderbore
cards.text: After Fight: If you are haunted, your opponent loses 2. Otherwise, your opponent loses 1.

cards.name: Brikk Nastee
cards.text: After another friendly Brobnar creature fights, gain 1.

cards.name: Cacophonous Riot
cards.text: Play: Ready and enrage a creature and each of its neighbors.

cards.name: Down To Size
cards.text: Play: Choose an enemy creature. Until the end of the turn, that creature is considered to have 1 power and 0 armor.

cards.name: Fiery Jark
cards.text: Play: Destroy an enemy creature and a friendly creature. You may repeat this effect as many times as you like, as long as it is possible to repeat the entire effect.

cards.name: Headhunter
cards.text: After Fight: Gain 1.

cards.name: Heavyweight Morik
cards.text:
Splash-attack 2.
Scrap: Deal 2 to a friendly creature and 2 to an enemy creature.

cards.name: Lash Out
cards.text: Play: If you are haunted, deal 3 to a creature with 3 splash. Otherwise, deal 3 to a creature.

cards.name: Memorialize the Fallen
cards.text: Play: Each player loses  equal to the number of creatures in their discard pile.

cards.name: Mournful Barn-Burner
cards.text:
After Fight: Discard the top 2 cards of a player’s deck.
Scrap: Each player discards the top card of their deck.

cards.name: Ornar Skullface
cards.text:
Assault 3.
Scrap: Deal 3 to a creature.

cards.name: Recklessness
cards.text:
Enhance .
Play: Each player discards 3 random cards from their hand, then draws 3 cards.

cards.name: Shock Herder
cards.text:
Deploy. (This creature can enter play anywhere in your battleline.)
Play: Ready and fight with a neighboring creature.

cards.name: Soul Bomb
cards.text: Omni: If you are haunted, deal 4 to each creature. Destroy Soul Bomb.

cards.name: Thunderdell
cards.text: While you are haunted, Thunderdell gains splash-attack 5.

cards.name: Igon the Terrible
cards.text:
Play: If Igon the Green has not been purged, destroy Igon the Terrible.
After Fight: Steal 1.

cards.name: Art Project
cards.text: Play: Unforge an opponent’s key. If you do, purge Art Project, and your opponent draws 10 cards.

cards.name: Azuretooth
cards.text:
Enhance .
After Fight/After Reap: Move each  from a friendly creature to your pool. Give control of that creature to your opponent.

cards.name: Curse of Spontaneity
cards.text:
Treachery. (This card enters play under your opponent’s control.)
At the start of your "draw cards" step, discard your hand.

cards.name: Ekwirrĕ’s Fulcrum
cards.text: At the end of each player's turn, they may gain 1. If they do, their opponent draws 2 cards.

cards.name: Elenya the Charming
cards.text:
Treachery.  (This card enters play under your opponent’s control.)
After you forge a key, give control of the most powerful friendly creature to your opponent.

cards.name: Envoy of Ekwirrĕ
cards.text: After Reap: Swap Envoy of Ekwirrĕ with one of its neighbors. Also swap all , damage, counters, and upgrades on these creatures.

cards.name: Flea Market
cards.text: Action: Look at a random card in your opponent’s hand. You may give your opponent 1. If you do, play that card as if it were yours.

cards.name: Freelancer
cards.text:
At the start of each turn, the active player takes control of this creature.
This creature may be used as if it belonged to the active house.

cards.name: Grisly Exchange
cards.text: Play: Put the top 5 cards of your opponent's discard pile on the bottom of their deck. Discard the top 5 cards of your deck.

cards.name: Insurance Policy
cards.text:
This creature gains, “Destroyed: If it is not your turn, gain 4.”
Play: Lose 1.

cards.name: Midyear Festivities
cards.text: Play: Choose 9 creatures. Move all  on the chosen creatures to their controllers’ pools. Destroy the chosen creatures.

cards.name: Put in a Spin
cards.text: Play: Lose 1. If you do, choose a house and discard the top card of your opponent’s deck. If that card belongs to the named house, gain 4.

cards.name: Skreel Swarm
cards.text:
Play: Deal 1 to each enemy creature.
Scrap: You may archive Skreel Swarm from your discard pile.

cards.name: Soul Exchange
cards.text: Play: Choose a player. Return the topmost creature from that player’s discard pile to their hand. Destroy a creature controlled by that player.

cards.name: Tachyon Manifold
cards.text: Action: Take another turn after this one. Your opponent draws 10 cards. Purge Tachyon Manifold.

cards.name: Talent Scout
cards.text:
Versatile. (This card may be used as if it belonged to the active house.)
Play: Look at your opponent’s hand and play a creature from it as if it were yours. Your opponent takes control of Talent Scout.

cards.name: The Æmber Road
cards.text: Omni: Put 1 trade counter on The Æmber Road, then gain 1 for each trade counter on it. Give control of The Æmber Road to your opponent.

cards.name: Transitory Philosopher
cards.text: Action: Steal 1 for each enemy artifact.

cards.name: Zavel, “Archaeologist”
cards.text:
Each time you play an artifact from your discard pile, gain 1.
Play/After Reap: You may play an artifact from your discard pile.

cards.name: Æmbitrage
cards.text:
Your keys cost +1. 
During your “draw cards” step, refill your hand to 1 additional card.

cards.name: Bonded Auctioneer
cards.text:
After Reap: Destroy an artifact. If you do, its controller gains 1.
Scrap: Return an artifact to its owner’s hand.

cards.name: Forbidden Tome
cards.text:
Enhance .﻿
Each haunted player refills their hand to 1 additional card during their “draw cards” step.

cards.name: Fortune Reverser
cards.text:
This creature's text box is considered blank, except for traits.
Play: Destroy all other upgrades attached to this creature.

cards.name: Gegrrŏkŭŭ Sapper
cards.text:
Play/After Fight: Take control of an enemy artifact. Give your opponent control of Gegrrŏkŭŭ Sapper.
Scrap: Destroy a friendly artifact. If you do, destroy an enemy artifact.

cards.name: Market Fluctuation
cards.text: Play: Each haunted player draws 3 cards. Each player that is not haunted discards 3 random cards from their hand.

cards.name: Outnegotiate
cards.text: Play: Choose a card in your opponent’s discard pile. Steal  equal to the number of  bonus icons on that card and put that card on the bottom of its owner’s deck.

cards.name: Pen Pal
cards.text: Action: Exhaust an enemy creature. If you do, each player gains 1.

cards.name: Phobivore
cards.text: This creature gains “While you are haunted, this creature cannot be used.”

cards.name: Pull Up Stakes
cards.text: Play: Shuffle 2 friendly creatures into their owners’ decks. Return 4 enemy creatures to their owners’ hands.

cards.name: Ravening Morphazoid
cards.text:
While you are haunted, Ravening Morphazoid gains poison and skirmish.
After Fight/After Reap: Draw a card. Discard a card.

cards.name: Sandhopper
cards.text: Action: Return a friendly creature to its owner’s hand. If you do, you may play a non‑Ekwidon creature from your hand.

cards.name: Sandwyrm
cards.text: After Fight: Shuffle Sandwyrm into your deck.

cards.name: Scrapscrounger
cards.text: After Reap: Swap an artifact from your discard pile with a card in your hand.

cards.name: Shopping Spree
cards.text: Play: Discard your hand. Draw a card for each card discarded this way.

cards.name: Technorachnophobia
cards.text: Play: Discard the top 10 cards of your deck. If you discard 5 or more cards of the same house this way, steal 2.

cards.name: Trade Secrets
cards.text: Play: Discard any number of Ekwidon cards from your hand. Steal 1 for each card discarded this way.

cards.name: Uncommon Currency
cards.text: Action: Swap control of Uncommon Currency and an enemy artifact.

cards.name: Belligerent Guard
cards.text:
Belligerent Guard enters play ready.
Play: Your opponent draws a card.

cards.name: De-escalation
cards.text: Play: Destroy each creature. Your opponent archives the top 3 cards of their deck.

cards.name: Estate Sale
cards.text: Play: Purge a non-creature card from your discard pile. If you do, gain 2.

cards.name: Gemcoat Vendor
cards.text: Action: Steal 1. Deal 1 to Gemcoat Vendor.

cards.name: Generous Offer
cards.text: Play: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, steal 2.

cards.name: Historian Li-Darkin
cards.text: After Reap: Each player returns the top card of their discard pile to their hand.

cards.name: Hoaxpitality
cards.text: Play: Choose an enemy creature and a friendly creature. Until the end of the turn, the friendly creature’s power is equal to the enemy creature's power.

cards.name: Incarnation Pod
cards.text:
Action: Choose a card in any discard pile and put it on the bottom of its owner’s deck.
Scrap: Purge the bottom card from each player's deck.

cards.name: Iron Heidy
cards.text: While you are haunted, Iron Heidy and each of Iron Heidy's neighbors get +2 armor.

cards.name: Legerdemain
cards.text:
Enhance .
Play: Return a damaged creature to its owner’s hand. If you do, its controller gains 1.

cards.name: Permanent Record
cards.text: Play: Exhaust a friendly creature. If you do, steal 2.

cards.name: Rumor-sower
cards.text: After Reap: Your opponent discards the top card of their deck. Stun an enemy creature that shares a house with the discarded card.

cards.name: Security Detail
cards.text: Play: A friendly creature and each of its neighbors captures 1.

cards.name: Siphonapterian
cards.text:
While you are haunted, Siphonapterian gains taunt.
Destroyed: If it is not your turn, gain 2.

cards.name: The Old Tinker
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
After Reap: Discard a card from your hand. Draw a card.

cards.name: Tutor Bin-Rillo
cards.text:
Play: Discard up to 3 cards. Your opponent draws a card.
Scrap: Each player draws a card.

cards.name: A Strong Feeling
cards.text: Play: Ready each friendly creature with  on it. Move 1 from each friendly creature to the common supply.

cards.name: Animating Force
cards.text:
This upgrade enters play attached to an artifact instead of a creature. 
Play: Take control of this artifact and put it on a flank of your battleline as a creature with 4 power and versatile.
Scrap: Gain 1.

cards.name: Call of Need
cards.text: Play: Search your deck for a card and discard it.

cards.name: Curse of Forgetfulness
cards.text:
Treachery. (This card enters play under your opponent’s control.)
At the end of your turn, purge the top card in your discard pile.

cards.name: Dark Memento
cards.text:
At the start of your turn, if you are not haunted, discard cards from the top of your deck until you are haunted.
Scrap: Discard the top card from a player‘s deck. If that player is not haunted, repeat this effect.

cards.name: Empathic Malice
cards.text:
Enhance .
Play: A friendly creature captures 3. If you are haunted, put Empathic Malice on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Future is Past
cards.text: Play: Swap each player's deck with their discard pile. Shuffle each player's deck.

cards.name: Island of Misfit Toys
cards.text: Action: Return each Geistoid card from your discard pile to your hand. Purge Island of Misfit Toys.

cards.name: Junkyard Cemetery
cards.text:
While there is a combined total of 10 or more cards between your purged cards and discard pile, you are haunted.
Action: Purge a card in your discard pile.

cards.name: Kaspara
cards.text:
X is the combined total of  between each player’s pools.
Each friendly Geistoid creature gains, “Play/Destroyed: Each player gains 1.”

cards.name: Mender
cards.text: Play/After Reap: Purge a card from a discard pile. Fully heal and ward each Robot creature.

cards.name: Miss Chievous
cards.text:
After a friendly Geistoid creature enters play, each player discards the top 2 cards of their deck.
After Reap: Play the topmost creature from your discard pile.

cards.name: Poltergeistoids
cards.text: Play: Purge a card from a discard pile. If you do, play a creature or artifact from your purged zone as if it were in your hand. Attach Poltergeistoids to it as an upgrade with the text, “This card belongs to house Geistoid.”

cards.name: Protective Playmate
cards.text:
Taunt.
While you are haunted, Protective Playmate gets +6 power. Otherwise, Protective Playmate gains elusive.

cards.name: Replicative Growth
cards.text:
Play: For the remainder of the turn, each friendly creature gains,
“After Reap: Move 1 from this creature to your pool.”

cards.name: Scooboo
cards.text: While Scooboo is in your discard pile, if you would draw a card during your turn, you may discard the top 3 cards of your deck and return Scooboo from your discard pile to your hand instead.

cards.name: Shadys
cards.text: Action: Play a creature from your discard pile. If that creature is Purse-a-phone, destroy Shadys.

cards.name: Synchronizer
cards.text:
Each friendly Clock creature gains, “Destroyed: Move half the time counters (rounding up) from this creature to Synchronizer.”
Omni: Move all time counters on Synchronizer to a friendly Clock creature.

cards.name: Varad the Indulgent
cards.text:
Varad the Indulgent gets +1 power for each  on it.
After another friendly Geistoid creature fights, Varad the Indulgent captures 1.

cards.name: Well of Memory
cards.text:
Play: Purge any number of cards from your hand. For each card purged this way, return a card from your discard pile to your hand.
Action: Destroy Well of Memory.

cards.name: Boiler
cards.text:
Destroyed: Deal 6 to each enemy flank creature.
Scrap: Deal 1 to each enemy creature.

cards.name: Cursed Tomb
cards.text:
Enhance .
Each creature with no  on it gains, “Destroyed: Purge this creature.”
If there are no creatures in play, purge Cursed Tomb.

cards.name: Dimo, Elderghast
cards.text:
Enhance .
Each friendly creature with  on it gains, “Destroyed: If you are haunted, gain 1 for each  on this creature.”

cards.name: Echofly
cards.text:
Action: Return an action card from your discard pile to your hand.
Scrap: Archive the topmost action card from your discard pile.

cards.name: Energy Vampirism
cards.text: Play: A creature captures 1 from its own side. For each  on that creature, deal 1 to a creature.

cards.name: Infiltrator
cards.text:
Skirmish. Treachery. Versatile.
At the end of your turn, destroy Infiltrator’s neighbors.

cards.name: Phantasmal Visit
cards.text: Play: Stun and exhaust a creature. If you are haunted, archive Phantasmal Visit.

cards.name: Plow-Sword
cards.text: Action: Put a creature in a discard pile on the bottom of its owner’s deck. If you do, deal 3 to a creature.

cards.name: Return to Rubble
cards.text: Play: Shuffle the top 10 cards of your discard pile into your deck. If you do, destroy each creature.

cards.name: Singing Scythe
cards.text:
While you are haunted, you may return Singing Scythe from your discard pile to your hand.
This creature gains “After Reap: If you are haunted, purge a card from a discard pile.”

cards.name: Soul Vial
cards.text: Each friendly creature with  on it gains: “Destroyed: Archive this creature.”

cards.name: Spontaneous Awakening
cards.text: Play: If your opponent is haunted, destroy an enemy artifact, Cyborg creature, or Robot creature. If you do, play that card as if it were in your hand. Attach Spontaneous Awakening to it as an upgrade with the text, “This card belongs to house Geistoid.”

cards.name: Tangler
cards.text:
After Reap: Stun a creature and each of its neighbors.
Scrap: Stun a creature.

cards.name: Thoughtcatcher
cards.text:
Enhance .
Each friendly creature with  on it gains, “Destroyed: Draw 1 card.”

cards.name: Tribute Collector
cards.text:
Taunt.
Play/After Fight: A friendly creature captures 1.

cards.name: Veil of Ectoplasm
cards.text: Play: For each Geistoid card in your discard pile, a friendly creature captures 1.

cards.name: Be Our Geist
cards.text: Play: Choose a creature in any haunted player's discard pile. Play that creature as if it were in your hand.

cards.name: Boo!
cards.text: Play: Discard the top 10 cards of a player’s deck.

cards.name: Darklamp
cards.text:
Each friendly creature with  on it gains elusive.
Play: Capture 1.

cards.name: Ecto-Charge
cards.text: Play: Forge a key at +20 current cost, reduced by 1 for each card in your discard pile. If you do, purge Ecto-Charge.

cards.name: Hallowed Eve Festival
cards.text: Play: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. For each Geistoid card discarded this way, a friendly creature captures 1.

cards.name: Harvest Skimmer
cards.text: After Reap: Discard the top card of your deck. If it is a creature, gain 1.

cards.name: Haunted House
cards.text:
At the start of your turn, if you are not haunted, discard the top card of your deck.
Omni: If you are haunted, gain 1.

cards.name: In Here Somewhere…
cards.text: Play: If you are haunted, archive 2 cards from your discard pile. Otherwise, discard the top 5 cards of your deck.

cards.name: Junk Restoration
cards.text:
Enhance .
Play: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put a card discarded this way into your hand.

cards.name: Memette
cards.text: Play/Destroyed: Archive the top card of your discard pile.

cards.name: Reaver
cards.text:
Enhance .
After Reap: Move 1 from a friendly creature to your pool. If you do, discard a card.

cards.name: Snippy
cards.text:
Skirmish.
Play: Deal 2 to a creature.
Scrap: Destroy an enemy flank creature.

cards.name: The Grim Reaper
cards.text:
If you are haunted, The Grim Reaper enters play ready. (You are haunted if there are 10 or more cards in your discard pile.)
After Reap: Purge an enemy creature and a friendly creature.

cards.name: Touchstone
cards.text: After Reap: If you are haunted, draw 2 cards. Otherwise, discard the top 2 cards of your deck.

cards.name: Webstur
cards.text:
Taunt.
After Fight: For each damage on Webstur, you may discard the top card of each player's deck.

cards.name: Winds of Death
cards.text: Play: Each player archives each creature from their discard pile. Destroy each creature.

cards.name: Ælbia Stray
cards.text:
If you are haunted, Ælbia Stray enters play ready.
After Reap: Capture 1.

cards.name: Ancestral Timekeeper
cards.text: At the end of your turn, put a time counter on each friendly Clock creature. If there are 12 or more time counters on Ancestral Timekeeper, purge Ancestral Timekeeper. If you do, take another turn after this one.

cards.name: Chronometer
cards.text: At the end of your turn, put a time counter on each friendly Clock creature. If there are 6 or more time counters on Chronometer, destroy Chronometer. If you do, purge a card from a discard pile.

cards.name: Precocious Fragment
cards.text: After Reap: If you are haunted, gain 1. Otherwise, discard the top card of your deck.

cards.name: Purse-a-phone
cards.text:
Keys cost –2.
Destroyed: If Shadys is in your discard pile, return it to your hand.

cards.name: Tick-Tock
cards.text: At the end of your turn, put a time counter on each friendly Clock creature. If there are 3 or more time counters on Tick-Tock, destroy Tick-Tock. If you do, archive up to 3 cards from your hand and discard pile.

cards.name: Soultender
cards.text: Play/After Reap: Move each  from each Specter creature to the common supply. Fully heal and ward each Specter creature.

cards.name: Aberrant Warp Event
cards.text: Play: Discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard a creature or run out of cards. If you discard a creature this way, put it into play and destroy one of its neighbors. Repeat the preceding effect on your opponent.

cards.name: Big Magnet
cards.text: Play: Choose a friendly creature. Take control of each upgrade in play and move it to that creature.

cards.name: Curse of Disappearances
cards.text:
Treachery. (This card enters play under your opponent’s control.)
At the end of your turn, put a friendly creature into your opponent’s archives. If that card leaves their archives, put it into its owner's hand instead.

cards.name: Destructive Analysis
cards.text: Play: Deal 2 to a creature. You may purge any number of cards from your archives. Deal an additional 2 to the same creature for each card purged this way.

cards.name: Elite Disruptzord
cards.text: Creatures more powerful than Elite Disruptzord cannot be played.

cards.name: Extinction
cards.text: Play: Destroy a creature and each creature that shares a trait with it. Gain 1 chain.

cards.name: Feeding Pit
cards.text: Action: Discard a creature from your hand. If you do, gain 1.

cards.name: Hypnotic Command
cards.text: Play: For each friendly Mars creature, choose an enemy creature to capture 1 from its own side.

cards.name: Ilxid Avenger
cards.text:
Play/After Fight: Give Ilxid Avenger a +1 power counter for each Mars card in your discard pile.
Scrap: Give a friendly creature a +1 power counter for each Mars card in your discard pile.

cards.name: Killzord Mk. 9001

cards.text: Play: Play a creature from your discard pile and attach Came Back Wrong to it as an upgrade with the text "This creature gets –2 power and gains poison."

cards.name: Cauldron
cards.text: Omni: Put the top card of your deck faceup under Cauldron. If there are 3 cards under Cauldron, play them one at a time as if they were in your hand.

cards.name: Fangtooth Cavern
cards.text: At the end of your turn, destroy the least powerful creature.

cards.name: Ghost Tree
cards.text:
While you are haunted, Ghost Tree deals no damage when fighting.
Scrap: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck.

cards.name: Halacor
cards.text: Each friendly flank creature gains skirmish. (When you use a creature with skirmish to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)

cards.name: Kangaphant
cards.text: Each creature gains, “After Reap: Destroy this creature.”

cards.name: Low Dawn
cards.text: Play: If there are 3 or more Untamed creatures in your discard pile, gain 2. Shuffle each Untamed creature from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Loyal Packmate
cards.text:
Taunt.
Enemy creatures cannot be used to fight friendly creatures unless the friendly creature has taunt.

cards.name: Mimicry
cards.text: When you play this card, treat it as a copy of an action card in your opponent’s discard pile.

cards.name: Narl Gibbus
cards.text:
While enraged Narl Gibbus gains skirmish and splash-attack 3.
Play/After Reap: Enrage Narl Gibbus.

cards.name: Nepenthe Seed
cards.text: Omni: Destroy Nepenthe Seed. Return a card from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Rotfeast
cards.text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, gain 1 each time a creature is dealt damage.

cards.name: Till the Earth
cards.text:
Enhance .
Play: Each player shuffles their discard pile into their deck.

cards.name: Waste Not
cards.text: Play: Destroy a friendly creature. Draw cards equal to half that creature’s power (rounding up).

cards.name: Way of the Porcupine
cards.text: This creature gains hazardous 3. (Before this creature is attacked, deal 3 to the attacking enemy.)

cards.name: Werewolf Curse
cards.text:
This creature gains
splash-attack 3 and "After Fight: Archive Werewolf Curse."
Play: Enrage this creature.

cards.name: Æmberfly
cards.text:
Elusive. Skirmish.
After Fight: Capture 1.
After Reap: Move 1 from Æmberfly to your pool.

cards.name: Blernean Hydra
cards.text:
Enhance .
While it is damaged, Blernean Hydra gains splash-attack X, where X is the amount of damage on Blernean Hydra.

cards.name: Bog Spitter
cards.text:
Skirmish.
After Fight: Discard a random card from a player's hand.
Scrap: If your opponent has 6 or more, steal 1.

cards.name: Dew Faerie
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
After Reap: Gain 1.

cards.name: Floomf
cards.text:
Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)
After Fight: Give a Beast creature two +1 power counters.

cards.name: Grave Pixie
cards.text: Destroyed: If you are haunted, archive Grave Pixie.

cards.name: Haunting Witch
cards.text: After you play a creature, if you are haunted, gain 1.

cards.name: Invigorating Shower
cards.text:
Enhance .
Play: Choose a house. Shuffle each card of that house from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Lost in the Wild
cards.text: Play: Shuffle each flank creature into its owner's deck. If you are haunted, repeat the preceding effect.

cards.name: Reclaimed by Nature
cards.text: Play: Purge an artifact. Resolve its bonus icons as if you had played it.

cards.name: Regrowth
cards.text: Play: Return a creature from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Skeletal Murmook
cards.text: While you are haunted, your opponent's keys cost +2.

cards.name: Spoo-key Charge
cards.text: Play: If you are haunted, forge a key at current cost. Shuffle your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: The Circle of Life
cards.text: Play: Each haunted player gains 2.

cards.name: Warfaline
cards.text: Play/After Fight: Shuffle the top 5 cards of a discard pile into their owner’s deck.

cards.name: Witch of the Eye
cards.text: After Reap: Return a card from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Witch of the Spore
cards.text:
Poison.
Scrap: Deal 3 to an enemy creature.

cards.name: Æmber Storm
cards.text: Play: For each  in your pool, deal 1 to an enemy creature.

cards.name: Cincinnatus Resurrexit
cards.text:
Cincinnatus Resurrexit gets +1 power for each  on it.
Play/After Fight: Capture 2 and exalt Cincinnatus Resurrexit.
Destroyed: If you are haunted, archive Cincinnatus Resurrexit.

cards.name: Duma the Returned
cards.text: Destroyed: Return the top 3 cards of your discard pile to your hand. If you are haunted, archive Duma the Returned.

cards.name: Encounter Golem
cards.text:
Hazardous 3.
After you play an action card, put that card on the bottom of your deck from your discard pile.
Destroyed: If you are haunted, archive Encounter Golem.

cards.name: Ghostly Dr. Verokter
cards.text:
Elusive.
Play/After Reap: Return a card from your discard pile to the top of your deck.
Destroyed: If you are haunted, archive Ghostly Dr. Verokter.

cards.name: Immortal Greking
cards.text:
Play: Take control of an enemy creature and place it anywhere in your battleline. Until Immortal Greking leaves play, that creature belongs to Immortal Greking's house.
Destroyed: If you are haunted, archive Immortal Greking.

cards.name: Phantom Drummernaut
cards.text:
Play/After Fight: Return a creature from your discard pile to your hand.
Destroyed: If you are haunted, archive Phantom Drummernaut.

cards.name: Portalmonster
cards.text:
If you are haunted, keys cost +1 for each card in your discard pile. Otherwise, keys cost –2.
Destroyed: If you are haunted, archive Portalmonster.

cards.name: Qyxxlyxx Grave Master
cards.text:
Play: Purge a creature from a discard pile. Deal 2 to each creature that shares one or more traits with the purged creature.
Destroyed: If you are haunted, archive Qyxxlyxx Grave Master.

cards.name: Revived Ză-Orhă
cards.text:
Play: If your opponent has more forged keys than you, forge a key at current cost. If you do, purge Revived Ză-Orhă.
Destroyed: If you are haunted, archive Revived Ză-Orhă.

cards.name: Spectral Ruth
cards.text:
Play: If you forged a key this turn, archive your discard pile.
Destroyed: If you are haunted, archive Spectral Ruth.

cards.name: Xenos Darkshadow
cards.text:
Assault X. Hazardous X. Splash-attack X.
X is the number of cards in your discard pile.
Destroyed: If you are haunted, archive Xenos Darkshadow.
